title: Bottle of Wine In the Backpack with Dr. Jody Carrington
description:
This week, Joe is joined once again by fan favorite Dr. Jody Carrington. She shares how kids know exactly how to get under your skin, even if you're a world renowned child psychologist. She also chats about the importance of teacher care. This one is a must listen for anyone who's ever questioned whether they are a good teacher.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
